CLOVER.description: 拾取增加 10% 的幸运值

RELIC_MAP.name: Carte de la Voie Lactée

RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.description: Permet de débloquer et d'activer les Arcanes.

RELIC_BANGER.description: Permet de changer la musique dans la Sélection du Niveau.

GILDED.description: Rassemble tout l'or laissé au sol et démarre une Ruée vers l'Or.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Casse-tête

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Formage
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Permet d'accéder à la liste des ennemis vaincus depuis le menu principal.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Grand Évangile
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Permet d'améliorer le niveau des armes au-delà de leurs limites. Peut être activité dans la Sélection du Niveau.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Parchemins Interdits de Morbane
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Permet de jeter des Sorts et d'accéder à la liste des secrets depuis le menu principal.

PURIFY.name: Flammes de Sortlune
PURIFY.description: Permet de supprimer 100 bonus alétoires d'Oeuf Doré. Ne peut pas être annulé.

TREASURE.description: 골드와 무작위 파워 업을 획득합니다. 강력한 적에게서만 획득할 수 있습니다.
TREASURE.name: 보물상자

NFT.description: 바라보는 방향으로 화염을 방사합니다. 플레이어 스탯에 영향을 받습니다.

RELIC_MAP.name: 은하수 지도

RELIC_TEAR.name: 마녀의 눈물
RELIC_TEAR.description: 스테이지 선택에서 게임 시간을 단축할수 있습니다.

GILDED.description: 땅에 떨어진 모든 금화를 흡수하며 황금의 피버타임을 가집니다.

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: 황금알
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: 현재 플레이중인 캐릭터의 무작위 능력치 한가지를 영구적으로 소폭 증가시킵니다.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: 엄숙한 마도서
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: 일시 정지 메뉴에서 발견한 무기 진화,조합법을 영구적으로 확인할수 있습니다.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: 코주부 안경
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: 캐릭터의 외형을 변경 가능하게 해줍니다 또한 게임 시작 전에 소지 가능한 최대 무기의 수량을 지정할 수 있습니다.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: 괴물 도감
RELIC_GOUDA.description: 메뉴에서 처치한 적 목록을 확인할수 있습니다.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: 위대한 복음
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: 무기의 한계를 돌파할수 있습니다. 스테이지 선택 화면에서 활성화할 수 있습니다

RELIC_SECRETS.name: 금지된 모르베인의 두루마리
RELIC_SECRETS.description: 주 메뉴에서 숨겨진 목록에 접근할수 있으며. 비밀 목록에서 마법주문을 시전할수 있습니다.

PURIFY.name: 무스펠의 불꽃
PURIFY.description: 최대 100개의 무작위 황금 알 보너스를 영구적으로 제거합니다.

RELIC_YELLOW.description: Позволяет обнаруживать скрытые предметы на всех этапах.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Мрачный Гримуар.
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Позволяет просматривать обнаруженные улучшения оружия и объединения из меню паузы.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Покоритель Разума
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Позволяет изменять внешний вид персонажа (где это применимо) и макс. загрузку оружия.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Арс Гауда
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Дает доступ к списку поверженных врагов из главного меню.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Великое Евангелие
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Позволяет повышать уровень оружия сверх его предела. Может быть включено при выборе этапа.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Запретные Свитки Морбейна.
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Позволяет вам произносить заклинания и получать доступ к списку секретов из главного меню.

PURIFY.name: Пламя Лунного Заклинания
PURIFY.description: Навсегда удалите до 100 случайных бонусов "Золотое яйцо". Это не может быть отменено.

COINBAGMAX.name: Gran saco de monedas
COINBAGMAX.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

OROLOGION.description: Congela a los enemigos durante 10 segundos.
OROLOGION.name: Orologion
OROLOGION.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

ROAST.name: Pollo asado
ROAST.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

ROSARY.description: Acaba con los enemigos a la vista.
ROSARY.name: Rosario
ROSARY.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

TREASURE.description: Otorga monedas y mejoras. Botín de enemigos fuertes.
TREASURE.name: Cofre de tesoro
TREASURE.tips: La calidad depende de tu suerte.

VACUUM.description: Recoge las gemas de experiencia que haya en el suelo.
VACUUM.name: Aspersor
VACUUM.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

NFT.description: Libera salvas de fuego en función de los atributos del jugador.
NFT.name: Enduja Fritta
NFT.tips: Aparece en función de tu suerte.

RELIC_MAP.name: Karte der Milchstraße
RELIC_MAP.description: Die Karte wird permanent im Pausenmenü aktiviert.

RELIC_TEAR.name: Sorceress' Tears
RELIC_TEAR.description: Permanently allows to speed up time in Stage Selection.

RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.description: Enables the unlocking and activation of Arcanas.
RELIC_RANDOMAZZO.name: Randomazzo

RELIC_BANGER.description: Permanently allows to change music in stage selection.
RELIC_BANGER.name: Magic Banger

GILDED.description: Gathers all gold left on the ground and starts a Gold Fever.
GILDED.name: Gilded Clover

RELIC_GLASSMASK.name: Glass Vizard
RELIC_GLASSMASK.description: Summons the merchant in all stages.

RELIC_GOLDENEGG.name: Golden Egg
RELIC_GOLDENEGG.description: Permanently improves a random stat for the current character, by a tiny amount.

RELIC_YELLOW.name: Yellow Sign
RELIC_YELLOW.description: Permanently allows to detect hidden items in all stages.

RELIC_GRIMOIRE.name: Grim Grimoire
RELIC_GRIMOIRE.description: Permanently allows to peek at discovered weapon evolutions and unions from the pause menu.

RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.name: Mindbender
RELIC_NOSEGLASSES.description: Permanently allows to change character appearance (where applicable) and maximum weapon loadout.

RELIC_GOUDA.name: Ars Gouda
RELIC_GOUDA.description: Permanently allows to access the list of defeated enemies from the main menu.

RELIC_GGOSPEL.name: Great Gospel
RELIC_GGOSPEL.description: Permanently allows to level up weapons beyond their limit. Can be enabled in Stage Selection.

RELIC_SECRETS.name: Forbidden Scrolls of Morbane
RELIC_SECRETS.description: Permanently allow you to cast spells and to access the list of secrets from the main menu.

PURIFY.name: Flames of Moonspell
PURIFY.description: Permanently remove up to 100 random Golden Egg bonuses. This cannot be undone.
